name: BookMyShow
details: BookMyShow GiftCard is a new way of gifting Movies,Plays,etc. to your loved ones.

name: NetFlix
details: NetFlix GiftCards can be used to pay for NetFlix subscription or to give as a gift.

name: Amazon
details: Amazon GiftCards can be used for purchasing itrms and digital downloads. To be exact you can download Amazon videos,Kindle books and amazon Music with them .

name: Spotify
details: Spotify giftcards can only be redeemed for premium individual plans.You can't use them for Premium student,Premium Family others.

name: Meesho
details: Meeshow Giftcards are used for discount offers to the items purchased in it.

name: Flipkart
details: Flipkart GiftCards can be used to redeem the offers for products to be purchasedin that site.

name: Google Play
details: Google Play GiftCards can be used to redeem the offer for movies,games,apps etc

name: Disney + Hotsar
details: Disney + Hotstar GiftCards can be used to avail offers in subscription of plans.

name: PayTM
details: PayTM GiftCards can be used to for money transactions.
